data.meta_description: Everyone has the opportunity to thrive. donate kidslink VOLUNTEER LATEST NEWS PARTNER https://videos.files.wordpress.com/DAxU1RPb/homepage-header.mp4#t=30 Serving the Community Since 1978 Greater Gallatin United Way changes lives, builds stronger communities, and mobilizes resources to ensure everyone has the opportunity to thrive.Our Impact Areas Mental Health & Well-being Basic Needs Early Learning Youth Success About Us Bringing communities together​
data.text:
OUR PROGRAMS

We offer a variety of programs designed to support individuals and families across our region. From our kidsLINK Afterschool Program to disaster relief efforts, we are here to provide vital resources and support.

Greater Gallatin United Way is dedicated to identifying and addressing the most pressing needs in our communities. From education and family support to emerging causes and crises, we collaborate with a network of partners to deliver impactful programs and innovative solutions. Together, we transform lives and create lasting, positive change.

Greater Gallatin United Way is more than an organization; it’s a movement—a movement of people coming together, united in their belief that every individual deserves the opportunity to thrive, and committed to creating a community where that vision becomes a reality.
